SQL.LOAD: SELECT search_config_id, field_name_xcd, sequence_number, created_by, created_date, modified_date, modified_by, search_config_criteria_id FROM elp_search_config_criteria WHERE search_config_criteria_id = :search_config_criteria_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_search_config_criteria SET search_config_id = :search_config_id, field_name_xcd = :field_name_xcd, sequence_number = :sequence_number, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE search_config_criteria_id = :search_config_criteria_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_search_config_criteria ( search_config_id, field_name_xcd, sequence_number, created_by, search_config_criteria_id ) VALUES ( :search_config_id, :field_name_xcd, :sequence_number, :created_by, :search_config_criteria_id )
